snippet.title: The Rise - Trailer
snippet.description:
Help Sam and Elicy on their challenging journey into the abyss. An epic 2D precision platformer where you must explore the unknown, overcome obstacles and discover secrets to reach the top of the abyss. Adventure awaits you!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2775030/The_Rise/
